Introduction

Heo Min-jin, best known by the stage name Choa, is a South Korean singer, actress, and YouTuber signed under Park With Entertainment. She is best known as a member of the South Korean girl group Crayon Pop, along with their sub-unit Choa & Way (Strawberry Milk) under Chrome Entertainment.

Chrome Entertainment:
